title: User Level not updated on the Boards and I'm unable to reply
body: Been level 30 for about a week now but the board shows I'm still level 1. I can't post/comment anywhere but here due to this, would be awesome if this got fixed!

replies.body: An account needs to sync with the boards sometimes, especially when posting for the first time.  It does look like you're showing as level 30 now.  Let me know if you run into any issues!
